issue.title: [R] Tidy up the pkgdown articles site index
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17528](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17528). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We could better organise the different articles we have to make it easier for users to find the right info

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17528?focusedCommentId=17585023) by Stephanie Hazlitt (stephhazlitt):*
We could consider a few broad categories for the first level e.g. Developers (already there), Installation, Users.
